last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 51
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's been one year since Hyo Sim left, but Tae Ho still waits for her. Carrot is born, and Hyo Jun becomes a lawyer. Besides that, all is the same at Hyo Sim's house. However, they all reflect on how inconsiderate they were to Hyo Sim as they live on. Tae Min picks up Jin Bum, who is getting released with a special pardon, at the prison. Meanwhile, Tae Ho sees Hyo Sim in an interview on TV and rushes out to find her. Will Tae Ho and Hyo Sim's reunion be beautiful?

name: Live Your Own Life
overview: The story of Hyo-sim, who sacrificed her life for her family trying to lead an independent life as she began to value herself.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Lee Hyo-sim, a breadwinner of her family, has spent her whole life sacrificing for her family, who leeches off of her. She finally decides to seek her own happiness and sets out to lead an independent life.

tagline: Hyo-sim, a devoted daughter, and her journey to independence.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Even on the day of her promotion to team leader at TS Fitness, Hyo Sim can't find a moment of peace.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim is utterly surprised when she encounters a new member at TS Fitness at five in the morning.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Myung Hee pulls off an escape from her captors, and Sook Hyang is alarmed when she gets the news.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following an unintended collision with Myung Hee, Hyo Do finds himself taking her to Uicheon Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: At TS Fitness, an unexpected happenstance brings together Hyo Sim and the heirs of Taesan Group.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tae Ho eventually ends up injuring himself at the gym by resisting Hyo Sim's training regimen.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Tae Ho and Tae Min clash while Tae Ho persists in uncovering his grandmother's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Caught between the fights of his parents, Tae Min feels like there's no one he can rely on.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Seeing her mother a bit under the weather for reasons she's keeping to herself has Hyo Sim feeling uneasy.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tae Ho gets rid of Jun Bum's car, and Jin Soo wants to send Tae Ho to prison.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Tae Ho quits going to the gym and looks for Myung Hee, and Tae Min asks Hyo Sim out again.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim finds out her mother borrowed money from Woo Ju, and Tae Ho gets a call that his grandmother is dead.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The reality of Myung Hee's funeral overwhelms Tae Ho, leaving him lost in a sea of sorrow.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim has to cater to Tae Ho in the hospital while trying to be a good daughter to Sun Soon.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Seriousness escalates for Hyo Jun at the police station, which could possibly hinder his legal career.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim is astounded by the reality that she must secure a loan from Indangsu, yet she has no other option.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Sun Soon gathers her kids and does the thing she does when she feels her life is lonely and meaningless.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Tae Ho asks Hyo Sim out on a date, but she cannot accept it due to her difficult situation.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Since Tae Ho is not willing to give up on Hyo Sim, she hurts him with harsh words.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Hyo Sung asks Hyo Sim about her relationship with Tae Ho and tells her to quit immediately.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim and her crew go on a three-day workshop to Damyang, and she lets Tae Ho join them.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Tae Min also heads over to Damyang where Hyo Sim and Tae Ho are, and Sun Soon calls Hee Ju over to her place.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Sook Hyang gets infuriated after she finds out about Hyo Sim. Tae Ho drives Hyo Sim home and meets Sun Soon.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Tae Ho is eager for Hyo Sim to confirm officially that they are dating, yet Hyo Sim is hesitant.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim's sense of pride crumbles completely when she is presented with the cost of selling her soul.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Enveloped by the enchanting snowfall, Hyo Sim and Tae Ho solidify their emotions through a poignant first kiss. Meanwhile, Tae Min acquires details about the car accident from the detective who handled the case. Despite Sook Hyang's insistence, Tae Hee is compelled to move back in, but she ingeniously finds ways to resist her mother's wishes. Tae Ho and Tae Min find themselves in a disagreement over rehiring Hyo Sim as the company model, while Hyo Sim gladly accepts Tae Ho's offer for a new phase in her life.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Expressing her desire for independence, Hyo Sim encounters strong resistance from her disapproving mother. Undeterred, she pushes forward with her plans to move out and actively looks for a new home. Despite reluctance, Tae Min proposes to Soo Kyung to ensure Jin Bum's safety, prompting Tae Ho to question his motives. Sun Soon makes a final effort to retain Hyo Sim by rallying neighbors.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Released from the ties of family responsibilities, Hyo Sim relishes the moments in her new home with Tae Ho. Tae Min, reluctantly married to Soo Kyung, is away on a honeymoon. Tae Hee, forced back home by Mr. Yeom, is now in confinement. Changes are imminent at Uicheon Villa with Hyo Sim's move to a new residence.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: In the midst of an inescapable situation with Mr. Yeom and his men, Myung Hee grapples with the challenge of finding an exit. Meanwhile, Tae Ho's trip to the supermarket with Hyo Sim unexpectedly brings him face-to-face with So Ra. With Tae Min and Soo Kyung back from their honeymoon, Tae Hee strategically plans her escape during a momentary diversion of attention. Hyo Jun's decision to give up his studies faces staunch opposition from Mi Rim, who refuses to let him throw in the towel. Hyo Sim takes decisive steps toward shaping her future.

episodes.name: Fairy Dancing
episodes.overview: After seeing Tae Ho collapse, Hyo Sim consoles him. She asks him why he is so sad, but Tae Ho laughs it over. After spending a honeymoon practically separately, Tae Min and Soo Kyung begin their marriage, which is only for show. Hyo Do and Tae Hee register their marriage, and Hee Ju goes to Sun Soon's house but gets put to work. Meanwhile, Tae Ho plans to make Taesan Group the company it once was.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: After a delightful date, Hyo Sim and Tae Ho return to Hyo Sim's house. However, Sun Soon, who had grilled Hyo Sim's address out of Hyo Sung, barges in and creates a scene. Meanwhile, Soo Kyung offers to help Tae Min with his promotion by using the power of the press to disturb Tae Ho, while Tae Hee returns home with Hyo Do, and Tae Ho takes Hyo Sim by her hand to see her mother, Sun Soon.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim has had enough of how her mom treats Tae Ho, and she finally lets out her frustration. She even throws some harsh words at Sun Soon, who ends up showing a lot of disappointment. Tae Min learns about Tae Ho digging deeper into the Daegwallyeong Pass incident through Soo Kyung, who isn't happy with how Tae Min is treating her. Meanwhile, Tae Ho takes Hyo Sim to where his parents are laid to rest.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: So, Tae Ho straight-up asks Tae Min if he's got the lowdown on what really went down with their old man's death. Things get heated, and they end up throwing punches. Later, Tae Ho crashes at Hyo Sim's pad, asking if he can crash there for the night. On the flip side, Tae Min is hustling hard to secure the top spot at Taesan Group, and he leaves Soo Kyung with scars while doing so. Meanwhile, Hyo Sim and Tae Ho are all lovey-dovey in a parking lot, clueless that they've got an audience.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Tae Ho and Myung Hee finally meet and shed tears of joy. Myung Hee tells Tae Ho to keep her a secret. With the money Hyo Sim gave her, Sun Soon takes over a cafe. Although Tae Min gets promoted to vice chairman, Tae Ho plans to stop him from becoming the chairman. Meanwhile, Tae Min and Soo Kyung's marriage shatters, and rumors at TS Fitness begin to spread.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim tells her boss she is quitting TS Fitness after he interrogates her about her relationship with Tae Ho. Tae Ho senses something isn't right with Hyo Sim and rushes to her house. However, he runs into Hyo Sung as he is leaving her place. Meanwhile, Myung Hee offers the chairman of TV Live a proposal, and Sook Hyang sets Tae Ho in a trap when things look dire between Tae Min and Soo Kyung.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: As Tae Ho falls into Sook Hyang's trap and gets taken away by the police, he asks Hyo Sung to look after Hyo Sim. Hyo Sim is shocked at the news, and she lets Tae Min know how horrible she feels when he comes to her about what happened with Soo Kyung. On the opening day of Sun Soon's cafe, Hyo Jun, who couldn't get over Mi Rim, shows up drunk and makes a mess. Meanwhile, Hyo Do meets with Tae Min, wanting to strike it rich, and tells him about Tae Hee.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Tae Ho's imprisonment exposes a distinct purpose, leading to Tae Min's interrogation visit. Despite Tae Min's inquiries, Tae Ho remains unwilling to provide any answers, causing frustration for Tae Min. Myung Hee starts disclosing Sook Hyang's heinous deeds on TV Live, leaving Sook Hyang uneasy. Hyo Sung, who dedicated his life to his job, faces termination. Thanks to Hyo Sung, Hyo Sim reconnects with Tae Ho and learns about Tae Ho's grandmother.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Tae Min and Myung Hee sit face-to-face, where Myung Hee ensures Tae Min's steadfast commitment to safeguarding Taesan Group. Recently released from prison, Tae Ho declares a management war against Sook Hyang and Jin Bum. Hyo Sim, spotting Tae Ho waiting for her outside her house, joyfully runs into his arms and informs him that her mother wants to meet him. Meanwhile, Mi Rim desperately searches for Hyo Jun.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim scolds Hyo Jun on behalf of Sun Soon, who has collapsed at the news of Mi Rim's pregnancy. Tae Ho grumbles sadly at Hyo Sim for having to leave Sun Soon's house. Myung Hee pressures Jin Bum to confess to the Daegwallyeong Pass incident, and later, Tae Min finds Jin Bum collapsed on the floor. Meanwhile, Sook Hyang frets about the prosecutor's investigation, and Mr. Yeom tells Tae Min that Myung Hee is behind it all.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Mi Rim's unexpected remarks turn Hyo Sim's house upside down, and Sun Soon falls ill again. Sook Hyang gets taken in for questioning by the prosecution, and Tae Ho searches for evidence one last time. Hyo Sung resorts to a loan shark for his children's education but runs into Hyo Do. Meanwhile, Tae Ho tries to earn brownie points with Hyo Sim's family by helping at the cafe, and Tae Min sees his world crumble as he learns Myung Hee's secret.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Myung Hee reveals the truth to Tae Ho, but Tae Ho can't hide his bewilderment. Sun Soon succumbs to Mi Rim's determination and approves her wish to find her husband. Tae Min leaves his resignation letter and keeps himself out of sight, but Tae Ho finds him. Meanwhile, Hyo Do takes a beating from Mr. Yeom and his men when he goes to help Hyo Sung, and Sook Hyang offers TV Live a proposition that could destroy Taesan.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: While Tae Ho and Tae Min stay up all night looking for a way to stop TV Live's attack on Taesan Group, they seem to become closer. Hyo Sim fervently spreads flyers to find her father and later comforts Tae Ho after learning about his relationship with Tae Min. Meanwhile, Tae Hee returns home after signing divorce papers and finds Mr. Yeom's attitude towards her suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim races to a piano academy and finds traces of her father there after hearing new information about him. Tae Ho warns Sook Hyang to leave Tae Min alone, and Sook Hyang plans to dump all crimes on Mr. Yeom. Ru Bi takes Pil Lip to Indangsu and learns everything about Hyo Sung's painful circumstances. Meanwhile, Jin Bum, who cannot contain his remorse, tells Tae Min the truth behind the Daegwallyeong incident.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Jin Bum apologizes to Tae Min and says he will go to prison. Hyo Sung accidentally finds a picture of a woman at the piano academy with Hyo Sim that they believe was where their father last stayed. Myung Hee gives Tae Min the dashcam footage of the Daegwallyeong Pass incident, and Tae Min and Tae Ho learn what happened. Meanwhile, Hee Ju tells Sun Soon that Tae Ho belongs to the family that runs Taesan Group, and Sun Soon calls Hyo Sim over right away.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Sook Hyang's longstanding deceitful behavior toward Mr. Yeom may soon have consequences. With Tae Min's help, Hyo Sung re-enters Taesan Group and persuades Hyo Sim to cease searching for their father. Tae Ho's visit to Uicheon Villa is an attempt to gain Sun Soon's approval for his marriage to Hyo Sim, but he is met with coldness from Sun Soon. Meanwhile, Tae Hee confides in Tae Min about a secret she has been keeping.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Tae Min tells Tae Ho that he will take care of everything and for him to get married and live a happy life. Hyo Sung finds Mr. Yeom's old phone and gives it to Tae Min, and Tae Ho gets in touch with Park Jin Myung. Tae Ho valiantly tries to win Sun Soon's heart, and Sun Soon is stunned at his behavior. Meanwhile, Kkeut Soon is shocked when she sees her grandson, who is supposed to be in the US, in the cafe. She and Hyo Sim track him down to find out more.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Tae Ho and Tae Min reunite with Park Jin Myung when he returns to Korea to give them crucial documents that will put Sook Hyang away for good. Kkeut Soon locks herself in her room after her heart breaks over her family. While Myung Hee tries to console her, Taesan Group requests her return, and she has no choice but to leave Uicheon Villa. Meanwhile, Sun Soon sobs when she sees how beautiful Hyo Sim is on the runway of a fashion show, and Tae Ho takes Hyo Sim to where they first meet to propose to her.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Hyo Sim meets her father, Chu Ryeon, who doesn't recognize her, and she reveals who she is in his hospital room. Hyo Sung meets Mi Hee, his music instructor from when he was a child. And through her, he learns why his father had left his family. Tae Ho takes Sun Soon to meet Myung Hee about his marriage to Hyo Sim. Meanwhile, Tae Ho and Hyo Sung get promotions for their parts in revealing the truth, and Hyo Sim meets Mi Hee when she goes to see Chu Ryeon again.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Tae Ho becomes upset at Hyo Sim's words to postpone their wedding, and they fight over it. Sun Soon reunites with Chu Ryeon but collapses out of bitter anger. She warns Hyo Sung and Hyo Sim never to think about giving Chu Ryeon their liver. Tae Ho asks Tae Min to postpone his promotion, and Hyo Jun goes to take his lawyer's exam. Meanwhile, Hyo Sim's family takes matters into their own hands to protect their family.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Knowing Hyo Sim went into the operating room to donate her liver, Sun Soon sobs in agony in front of the doors. While worrying about Hyo Sim for being out of touch, Tae Ho realizes something horrible has happened when he sees Hyo Sung missing from his desk. After the surgery, Hyo Sim questions her life while watching her family restabilize at her sacrifice. Meanwhile, Tae Hee and Tae Min visit Sook Hyang at the corrections facility, and Tae Ho rushes to the hospital when he finds out about Hyo Sim.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: It's been one year since Hyo Sim left, but Tae Ho still waits for her. Carrot is born, and Hyo Jun becomes a lawyer. Besides that, all is the same at Hyo Sim's house. However, they all reflect on how inconsiderate they were to Hyo Sim as they live on. Tae Min picks up Jin Bum, who is getting released with a special pardon, at the prison. Meanwhile, Tae Ho sees Hyo Sim in an interview on TV and rushes out to find her. Will Tae Ho and Hyo Sim's reunion be beautiful?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Lee Hyo-sim, a breadwinner of her family, has spent her whole life sacrificing for her family, who leeches off of her. She finally decides to seek her own happiness and sets out to lead an independent life.
